scripts.compile-prod: ./node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js src/index.js -o assets/js/bundle.js -t babelify && uglifyjs assets/js/bundle.js -o assets/js/bundle-prod.js && ./node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js src/index-socket.js -o assets/js/index-bundle.js -t babelify && uglifyjs assets/js/index-bundle.js -o assets/js/index-bundle-prod.js
scripts.test-client: nodemon --exec 'npm run compile && npm start' ./src/ --ignore assets/js/
